LanguageData.AlertEarlessMousekinFeelingMiserableDesc: These Mousekins have recently lost both of their ears to disease or injury, and are ashamed of their disfigurement:\n\n{0}
LanguageData.AlertEarlessMousekinFeelingSuicidalDesc: These Mousekins are humiliated by their prolonged loss of of their ears to disease or injury, and have a very high risk of committing suicide from despair over the next few days:\n\n{0}
LanguageData.AlertEarlessMousekinDescEnding: Craft some prosthetic ears from cloth, or obtain natural ears from other Mousekins.
